about_the_game:
Energy Invasion original soundtrack by Nick R 61.
Contains full version of all in-game tunes and 7 bonus-tracks.

Tracklist:
Flint Glass - Al Azif (Nick R 61 Remix)
Nick R 61 - Australia
Nick R 61 - Ave Maria
Nick R 61 - Azov
Nick R 61 - Braids
Nick R 61 - Davai Zakurim
Nick R 61 - Electronic Swindle
Nick R 61 - Flashback
Nick R 61 - Lampochka
Nick R 61 - Novocherkassk
Nick R 61 - Pesok skvoz palcy
Nick R 61 - Rostov-on-Don
Nick R 61 - Sahara
Nick R 61 - T-R-A-C-E-U-R
Nick R 61 - Taboo
Nick R 61 - Taganrog
Nick R 61 - Volgodonsk
Ralp - Reter (Nick R 61 Remix)
Syndrom - Dala Dala (Nick R 61 Remix)

Tracklist (Bonus):
Nick R 61 - Belomorkanal
Nick R 61 - Crazy Language
Nick R 61 - ET nro acredita nas pessoas
Nick R 61 - ID00M
Nick R 61 - Mescalito
Nick R 61 - Paganini
Nick R 61 - tothetop
